data.name: POSTAL: Brain Damaged Art Book
data.detailed_description:
POSTAL: Brain Damaged, the boomer-shooter spin-off of the beloved Running With Scissors franchise gives a whole new perspective on the entire POSTALVERSE. Things get even more insane than usual, as we enter the deranged, fractured mind of the POSTAL Dude. HYPERSTRANGE artists and designers took the opportunity to create the most psychedelic and diverse FPS experience with environments and enemies taken straight out of twisted fever dreams.

This 96-page high-definition digital artbook will take you through the darkest corners, and the most colorful excesses of POSTAL: Brain Damaged!

content_descriptors.notes: The artbook contains disturbing images of disfigured cartoon characters, depictions of violence, as well as some nudity, albeit not realistic.
